title: Pixel 4a dont connect via Bluetooth to my car
content:
When I try to connect my phone (Pixel 4a) to the car's multimedia system (Sync 1), the phone shows an error when connected via Bluetooth, and at the bottom is a hint to restart the phone, after rebooting the phone does not connect to the multimedia system.
I checked on phones from other manufacturers (Samsung, Apple) they connected to the system correctly and without errors. Then I took the model (Pixel 1) and it could not connect to the multimedia system, as well as my Pixel 4a, so this is not a problem with the multimedia of my car, other manufacturers' phones successfully connected, and Pixel 1 and Pixel 4a failed.
Maybe you can send me an update for Bluetooth so I can connect to multimedia.
